00015 /// \file
00016 /// Provides the global variables instructions.
00017 
00018 #include <machine.hpp>
00019 #include <instructions.hpp>
00020 
00021 namespace Instructions {
00022     
00023     /// \name Globals
00024     /// \{
00025     
00026     /// \deprecated_mitproto
00027     void DEF(Machine & machine){
00028         machine.globals.push(machine.stack.pop());
00029     }
00030     
00031     /// \deprecated_mitproto
00032     void DEF_TUP(Machine & machine){
00033         machine.execute(FAB_TUP);
00034         machine.globals.push(machine.stack.pop());
00035     }
00036     
00037     /// \deprecated_mitproto
00038     void DEF_VEC(Machine & machine){
00039         machine.execute(FAB_VEC);
00040         machine.globals.push(machine.stack.pop());
00041     }
00042     
00043     /// \deprecated_mitproto
00044     template<int elements>
00045     void DEF_NUM_VEC_N(Machine & machine){
00046         Tuple tuple(elements);
00047         for(Index i = 0; i < elements; i++) tuple.push(0);
00048         machine.globals.push(tuple);
00049     }
00050     
00051     /// \deprecated_mitproto
00052     void DEF_NUM_VEC(Machine & machine){
00053         machine.execute(FAB_NUM_VEC);
00054         machine.globals.push(machine.stack.pop());
00055     }
00056     
00057     /// Push a global variable on the execution stack.
00058     /**
00059      * \tparam index The index of the global in the gobals list.
00060      * \return The value of the global variable.
00061      */
00062     template<int index>
00063     void GLO_REF_N(Machine & machine){
00064         machine.stack.push(machine.globals[index]);
00065     }
00066     
00067     /// Push a global variable on the execution stack.
00068     /**
00069      * \param Int8 The index of the global in the gobals list.
00070      * \return The value of the global variable.
00071      */
00072     void GLO_REF(Machine & machine){
00073         Index index = machine.nextInt8();
00074         machine.stack.push(machine.globals[index]);
00075     }
00076     
00077     /// Push a global variable on the execution stack.
00078     /**
00079      * \param Int16 The index of the global in the gobals list.
00080      * \return The value of the global variable.
00081      */
00082     void GLO_REF16(Machine & machine){
00083         Index index = machine.nextInt16();
00084         machine.stack.push(machine.globals[index]);
00085     }
00086     
00087     /// Define a function as a global.
00088     /**
00089      * The address of the next instruction is pushed on the globals list
00090      * and execution continues after the function definition.
00091      * 
00092      * \tparam size The number of (following) bytes that define the function.
00093      */
00094     template<int size>
00095     void DEF_FUN_N(Machine & machine){
00096         machine.globals.push(machine.currentAddress());
00097         machine.skip(size);
00098     }
00099     
00100     /// Define a function as a global.
00101     /**
00102      * The address of the next instruction is pushed on the globals list
00103      * and execution continues after the function definition.
00104      * 
00105      * \param Int8 The number of (following) bytes that define the function.
00106      */
00107     void DEF_FUN(Machine & machine){
00108         Size size = machine.nextInt8();
00109         machine.globals.push(machine.currentAddress());
00110         machine.skip(size);
00111     }
00112     
00113     /// Define a function as a global.
00114     /**
00115      * The address of the next instruction is pushed on the globals list
00116      * and execution continues after the function definition.
00117      * 
00118      * \param Inti16 The number of (following) bytes that define the function.
00119      */
00120     void DEF_FUN16(Machine & machine){
00121         Size size = machine.nextInt16();
00122         machine.globals.push(machine.currentAddress());
00123         machine.skip(size);
00124     }
00125     
00126     /// \}
00127
